Texts.Eng: Complete the ^orange;Distortion Sphere Tech obstacle course^reset;
Excellent! The ^orange;Distortion Sphere Tech^white; performed just as I'd hoped it would. Please, keep it - thanks to you I've been able to make significant strides in my research!

My ^orange;Distortion Sphere Tech^white; is ready to roll! I'd like you to ^green;test it on the new obstacle course^white; I've set up. You should have no problems getting into any of the narrow spaces inside. ^green;Talk to me again when you're ready to go in.
Talk to ^orange;Elliott^reset; to enter the ^orange;obsctacle course^reset;
